name: Eating Hearts
description:
Made for the RPG Maker Jam 3 organized by my friend FoxFiesta, the theme was "Contagious".

RPG Maker isn't really made for platformers (duh) but it was fun nonetheless, it was a very different development process from Picture of a Daydream, my entry to the previous RPG Maker Jam.

I was originally supposed to include the theme in the scenario but I ended up running out of time (I unfortunately had to miss a day due to an appointment) so it ended up not really being there. But hey, still fun.

Credits
Scripts :
RME & ORMS by Team RME (Special mention to Zangther for fixing spritesheet_erase)
Arc Engine by Khas Arcthunder
Fullscreen++ by Zeus81

Graphics :
Space Base Platform Shooter 8-bit by sitebender, edits and adds by Imanor

Sound :
Typhoon's Theme by Spring.
8-Bit Sound Effect Pack (Vol. 001) by Xenocity
8-Bit Sound Effects Library by Little Robot Sound Factory
